entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then clearing. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 14 except 8 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 14 except 8 along parts of the coast. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the evening. A few showers beginning near midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023
